Default: Buttons are aligned with text (left in LTR languages, right in RTL languages)


More information.

mzp-l-align-end: Align buttons opposite to text (right in LTR languages, left in RTL languages)


More information.

mzp-l-align-center: Align buttons in the center


More information.

mzp-l-stretch: Stretch buttons to full width

Only use this in narrow forms! This example shows two buttons but most forms will have only one.
